events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer role and will begin reviewing their qualifications shortly.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to relevant experience in software development and DevOps skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's process and will coordinate the next steps for this software engineer position.
The initial screening call with the candidate was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software development.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically accepted the invitation to proceed to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week with the senior engineering panel to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and performed well on all coding exercises demonstrating strong engineering capabilities.
An HR interview has now been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and other employment details with the candidate.
The HR interview was successful, with the candidate expressing great interest in the companyâ€™s values and the role.
A job offer for the software engineer position has been formally proposed to the candidate with detailed information about salary and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about potentially joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their start date and readiness to onboard with the engineering department.
The onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and access provisioning to all necessary development tools and resources.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and actively contributing to projects.
